summary: Everything shared from my site to Mastodon runs out of a single all activity RSS feed.  You're welcome to subscribe to it, but it's formatted with social syndication in mind — emojis, hashtags and truncation that match that use case.  This feed is populated from a fairly verbose processContent collection...
title: Syndicating an RSS feed to Mastodon using a Cloudflare worker

summary: It only took a shade over 24 hours, but here I am.  Brazil was so lovely and I’m happy I went, but I’m also very very happy to be home.  Plan for today: go to bed at, like, 6pm...
title: Home From Brazil
